Story

SHITAMACHI, JAPAN - 2055

The city of Shitamachi, Japan, is well-known as the worldwide cybercrime center since the end of World War III, in 2040.

All inhabitants have a chip controlled by brain spasms, carrying information about each citizen.

Fifteen years after the war, all television broadcasts were disrupted to stream the brutal execution of the Japanese prime minister. A hacker self-entitled M3SSI4H confessed as the author of said crime.

With a timer in hand, he threatens to explode Shitamachi.

His condition to disable the bomb is a flash drive, containing the necessary file to erase all neural information through the chips, allowing a new beggining to society.

Genetically modified to be a super-soldier at service of the special police forces, hacker Yatsumi Okimoto received a new mission through the commander of the local police, captain Tsurugi.

Her goal is to eliminate M3SSI4H – before he puts not only Japan, but the whole humanity at risk.
